mapper.insert: insert into t_backlog ( backlog_id, backlog_module_id, backlog_sprint_id, backlog_type, backlog_status_id, backlog_current_user_id, backlog_title, backlog_priority_order, backlog_priority, backlog_importance, backlog_deadline, backlog_create_time ) values ( #{id}, #{moduleId}, #{sprintId}, #{type}, #{statusId}, #{currentUserId}, #{title}, #{priorityOrder}, #{priority}, #{importance}, #{deadLine}, now() )
mapper.select: select b.*, m.module_name, s.status_name from t_backlog b left join t_module m on b.backlog_module_id = m.module_id left join t_status s on b.backlog_status_id = s.status_id where b.backlog_epic_id = #{epicId} and s.status_name <> #{finishStatusName}

select b.*, m.module_name, s.status_name from t_backlog b left join t_module m on b.backlog_module_id = m.module_id left join t_status s on b.backlog_status_id = s.status_id where b.backlog_epic_id = #{epicId} and s.status_name = #{finishStatusName}
